asia.title: Apple inks $500m deal for rare earth magnets with US mining firm
asia.snippet: China supplies most rare earth magnets to electronics manufacturers, but curbed exports earlier this year

emerging_markets.title: Markets Open Higher On Lower PPI, EU & Indonesia Add Tariff Talk Momentum
emerging_markets.snippet: Like CPI, this morning's PPI print came in lower than Wall Street expected. Kevin Hincks points out that some sectors like services saw significantly lower pricing.

emerging_markets.title: Turkish Inflation Cools, Keeping Central Bank on Course for July Rate Cut
emerging_markets.snippet: The cooling trend could reassure Turkey's central bank, which held its key rate in May after hiking it in April.

emerging_markets.title: India's defense stocks still have room to run, says analyst
emerging_markets.snippet: Arun Leslie John, Chief Market Analyst at Century Financial says India has more scope to increase defense spending, which will in turn fuel demand for stocks in the sector.

global.title: Did the U.S. Dodge a Recession? The Data Say: Not So Fast.
global.snippet: BCA Research Chief Global Strategist Peter Berezin has doubts about the outlook. The firm says investors should be slightly underweight on stocks.
